Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.depots

Class DepotsManager

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.depots.DepotsManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
AcceptsSupplies
public class DepotsManager extends Object implements AcceptsSupplies
Manages all the depot that can contain resources from the market and the productions, namely warehouse and leader depots.

  • Method Details

    • addSupply

      public void addSupply​(DepotID slot, WarehouseObjectType wot, DepotID from) throws SupplyException
      Adds the supply to the specified storage. Information about the source of the object needed. Beforehand the corresponding additionAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Specified by:
      addSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      slot - Storage to add the supply to
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      from - Source of the supply
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot accept the supply

    • removeSupply

      public void removeSupply​(DepotID from, WarehouseObjectType wot) throws SupplyException
      Removes the supply from the specified storage. Beforehand the corresponding removalAllowed method is called to check if the operation can be performed.
      Specified by:
      removeSupply in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Parameters:
      from - Storage to remove the supply from
      wot - One of the five types of resources in the game
      Throws:
      SupplyException - The container cannot remove the supply

    • clearSupplies

      public Pair<SupplyContainer,​SupplyContainer> clearSupplies()
      Removes all of the supplies.
      Specified by:
      clearSupplies in interface AcceptsSupplies
      Returns:
      A pair of SupplyContainer containing the removed supplies. The first element contains supplies from the depots, the second one supplies from the strongbox.

      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getResourceCount

      public int getResourceCount​(WarehouseObjectType... wots)
      Returns the number of the given supplies contained in warehouse and in leader depots.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • getAllowedDepots

      public ArrayList<DepotID> getAllowedDepots​(DepotID from, WarehouseObjectType type)
      Returns the depots that can receive the specified supply.
      Parameters:
      from - Source of the supply
      type - Type of the supply
      Returns:
      The depots that can receive the specified supply

    • allocate

      public void allocate​(SupplyContainer sc)
      Adds the supplies in the container passed as argument to the warehouse and leaders depots. In the process it is likely that the order of the depots in the warehouse will be modified.
      Parameters:
      sc - SupplyContainer containing the resources to add to the depots

    • addMarble

      public void addMarble​(DepotID slot, MarbleColor color) throws MarbleException, SupplyException, LeaderException, NoSuchMethodException
      Tries to add the marble to the given depot.
      Parameters:
      slot - ID of the depot
      color - Style of the marble
      Throws:
      MarbleException - Wrong depot ID
      SupplyException - Cannot add the marble
      LeaderException - No active leader yet
      NoSuchMethodException - No leader with the market ability
